name: Jammy-Like (Major-jam Entry)
description:
Controls:
-Arrows to move.
-X to open inventory and select.
-Z to close inventory and back.

Description:
The limitation for this years major-jam was "gameplay must reach outside of the game space", I was struggling to think of any good ideas with this in mind. Ive had my eye on pico-8 for a few months now, and decided to put a spin on the limit as an excuse to purchase pico-8.

Pico-8 is outside of my game development space, and is totally new to me. So I dont regret purchase, what a enjoy little console!

Disclaimer:
This game is made following a tutorial as I am totally new to developing with pico-8.
